name: One punch cholo
description:
This is our entry for the GMTK game jam, it is also the first game jam we participate. Due the deadline and no having a lot of experience in gamedev we didn't add sound effects nor music.

HOW TO PLAY:
A / D  to move
R to reset the level
J to shoot your punch

Graphics, coding: Sergio Martínez
Level design: Carlos Villanueva
